summary: The module implements an in‑memory mock of the AWS FSx service for the Moto testing framework. It provides a backend that manages the lifecycle of virtual file systems, handles tagging and translates ARNs to internal resources, and defines a file system model that stores a hierarchical directory structure and can be exported as a dictionary.
business_intent: Enable developers to test code that interacts with Amazon FSx without accessing real AWS resources, by simulating FSx APIs and file system behavior.
